languages.text: "Я никого не вижу, {name}... но я более чем ощущаю присутствие варпа. Говоришь, ты можешь зрить ее? Значит, наваждение само решило тебе раскрыться. Зачем... вот это действительно хороший вопрос".

"I cannot see anyone, {name}... but I can certainly sense a warp presence nearby. You're saying you can perceive it? Then the entity itself has decided to reveal its form to you. The real question is... why?"
languages.original_text: "Я никого не вижу, {name}... но я более чем ощущаю присутствие варпа. Говоришь, ты можешь зрить ее? Значит, наваждение само решило тебе раскрыться. Зачем... вот это действительно хороший вопрос".

traits.locale_text: "I cannot see anyone, {name}... but I can certainly sense a warp presence nearby. You're saying you can perceive her? Then the entity itself has decided to reveal its form to you. The real question is... why?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I cannot see anyone, {name}... but I can certainly sense a warp presence nearby. You're saying you can perceive her? Then the entity itself has decided to reveal its form to you. The real question is... why?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I cannot see anyone, {name}... but I can certainly sense a warp presence nearby. You're saying you can perceive it? Then the entity itself has decided to reveal its form to you. The real question is... why?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I cannot see anyone, {name}... but I can certainly sense a warp presence nearby. You're saying you can perceive it? Then the entity itself has decided to reveal its form to you. The real question is... why?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I cannot see anyone, {name}... but I can certainly sense a warp presence nearby. You're saying you can perceive it? Then the entity itself has decided to reveal its form to you. The real question is... why?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Je ne vois personne, {name}... mais je perçois une présence du Warp à proximité, c'est indéniable. Vous dites pouvoir la sentir ? Cela signifie que l'entité a décidé de se révéler à vous. Mais... pour quelle raison ? »
languages.original_text: "I cannot see anyone, {name}... but I can certainly sense a warp presence nearby. You're saying you can perceive it? Then the entity itself has decided to reveal its form to you. The real question is... why?"

traits.locale_text: « Je ne vois personne, {name}... mais je perçois une présence du Warp à proximité, c'est indéniable. Vous dites pouvoir la sentir ? Cela signifie que l'entité a décidé de se révéler à vous. Mais... pour quelle raison ? »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「何も見えません、{name}さん…ですが、近くに歪みを感じます。あなたも認識できる、と？だとしたら、その存在自体があなたに姿を現すことを決めたということです。考えるべきは…その理由です」
languages.original_text: "I cannot see anyone, {name}... but I can certainly sense a warp presence nearby. You're saying you can perceive it? Then the entity itself has decided to reveal its form to you. The real question is... why?"

traits.locale_text: 「何も見えません、{name}さん…ですが、近くに歪みを感じます。あなたも認識できる、と？だとしたら、その存在自体があなたに姿を現すことを決めたということです。考えるべきは…その理由です」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “我什么人都没看到，{name}……但我能感觉到，这附近存在着亚空间的生物。你是说，你能感觉到它的存在吗？这说明那只生物决定向你展露它的样子，但问题是……它为什么要这么做？”
languages.original_text: "I cannot see anyone, {name}... but I can certainly sense a warp presence nearby. You're saying you can perceive it? Then the entity itself has decided to reveal its form to you. The real question is... why?"

traits.locale_text: “我什么人都没看到，{name}……但我能感觉到，这附近存在着亚空间的生物。你是说，你能感觉到它的存在吗？这说明那只生物决定向你展露它的样子，但问题是……它为什么要这么做？”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Ich sehe niemanden, {name} ... doch ich spüre ganz klar eine Warp-Präsenz in der Nähe. Ihr sagt, Ihr könnt sie wahrnehmen? Dann hat das Wesen entschieden, Euch seine Gestalt zu offenbaren. Die wahre Frage ist ... warum?"
languages.original_text: "I cannot see anyone, {name}... but I can certainly sense a warp presence nearby. You're saying you can perceive it? Then the entity itself has decided to reveal its form to you. The real question is... why?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich sehe niemanden, {name} ... doch ich spüre ganz klar eine Warp-Präsenz in der Nähe. Ihr sagt, Ihr könnt sie wahrnehmen? Dann hat das Wesen entschieden, Euch seine Gestalt zu offenbaren. Die wahre Frage ist ... warum?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «No veo a nadie, {name}... pero noto claramente una presencia de la disformidad por aquí cerca. ¿Y dice usted que puede percibirla? Entonces la propia entidad habrá decidido revelarle su forma. La cuestión es... ¿por qué?».
languages.original_text: "I cannot see anyone, {name}... but I can certainly sense a warp presence nearby. You're saying you can perceive it? Then the entity itself has decided to reveal its form to you. The real question is... why?"

traits.locale_text: «No veo a nadie, {name}... pero noto claramente una presencia de la disformidad por aquí cerca. ¿Y dice usted que puede percibirla? Entonces la propia entidad habrá decidido revelarle su forma. La cuestión es... ¿por qué?».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Ben kimseyi göremiyorum {name}... Fakat yakınlarda bir öteboyut varlığı var, sezebiliyorum. Onu algılayabildiğini mi söylüyorsun? Öyleyse varlık, biçimini sana açık etmeye karar vermiştir. Asıl soruysa... Neden?"
languages.original_text: "I cannot see anyone, {name}... but I can certainly sense a warp presence nearby. You're saying you can perceive it? Then the entity itself has decided to reveal its form to you. The real question is... why?"

traits.locale_text: "Ben kimseyi göremiyorum {name} ama yakınlarda kesinlikle bir öteboyut varlığı sezebiliyorum. Onu algılayabildiğini mi söylüyorsun? Öyleyse varlık, biçimini sana açık etmeye karar vermiş demektir. Asıl soru: Neden?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
